body:
Hello!

So I think earlier this month, i created a discussion about clash of clans. I decided to make a new clan with avicus themes. The clan name is AvicusCOC, So far, I'm the leader (Thesupremetaco). I would like to get as many COC players on avicus to join! I'm giving out free Co-leader to the first 3 people who join! Elder will be free to everyone. To become Co after the offer, Donate 100 troops! if you guys have opinions about war frequency say in the comments! Here's the link to what the banner looks like: http://clashofclans.wikia.com/wiki/Clan_Symbol?file=Symbol_33.png 
I can't wait to see you guys join (hopefully)! Oh and The there's no trophy limit! :)

replies.body: Hey not to be a spoil sport but there once was a clan called Avicus Network it did have a tonne of people but then it died because no one was ever online. we lost like 35 clan wars and only won 1 soooo....... yehif u need me badly for a clan war that we know the full team is gonna be active plz let me know on Skype, banway.99 and on COC. I am in the clan called Raziel with about 20 or so members. my username is the same as MC.Banway out!
